00025 template <class U_POOL>
00026 struct AkArrayAllocatorNoAlign
00027 {
00028     static AkForceInline void * Alloc( size_t in_uSize )
00029     {
00030         return AK::MemoryMgr::Malloc( U_POOL::Get(), in_uSize );
00031     }
00032 
00033     static AkForceInline void Free( void * in_pAddress )
00034     {
00035         AK::MemoryMgr::Free( U_POOL::Get(), in_pAddress );
00036     }
00037 };
00038 
00039 template <class U_POOL>
00040 struct AkArrayAllocatorAlignedSimd
00041 {
00042     static AkForceInline void * Alloc( size_t in_uSize )
00043     {
00044         return AK::MemoryMgr::Malign( U_POOL::Get(), in_uSize, AK_SIMD_ALIGNMENT );
00045     }
00046 
00047     static AkForceInline void Free( void * in_pAddress )
00048     {
00049         AK::MemoryMgr::Falign( U_POOL::Get(), in_pAddress );
00050     }
00051 };
00052 
00053 // Common allocators:
00054 typedef AkArrayAllocatorNoAlign<_ArrayPoolDefault> ArrayPoolDefault;
00055 typedef AkArrayAllocatorNoAlign<_ArrayPoolLEngineDefault> ArrayPoolLEngineDefault;
00056 typedef AkArrayAllocatorAlignedSimd<_ArrayPoolLEngineDefault> ArrayPoolLEngineDefaultAlignedSimd;
00057 
00059 template <class T, class ARG_T, class TAlloc = ArrayPoolDefault, unsigned long TGrowBy = 1> class AkArray : public TAlloc
00060 {
00061 public:
00063     AkArray()
00064         : m_pItems( 0 )
00065         , m_uLength( 0 )
00066         , m_ulReserved( 0 )
00067     {
00068     }
00069 
00071     ~AkArray()
00072     {
00073         AKASSERT( m_pItems == 0 );
00074         AKASSERT( m_uLength == 0 );
00075         AKASSERT( m_ulReserved == 0 );
00076     }

00078 // Workaround for SWIG to parse nested structure: 
00079 // Bypass this inner struct and use a proxy in a separate header.
00080 #ifndef SWIG

00082     struct Iterator
00083     {
00084         T* pItem;   
00085 
00087         Iterator& operator++()
00088         {
00089             AKASSERT( pItem );
00090             ++pItem;
00091             return *this;
00092         }
00093 
00095         Iterator& operator--()
00096         {
00097             AKASSERT( pItem );
00098             --pItem;
00099             return *this;
00100         }
00101 
00103         T& operator*()
00104         {
00105             AKASSERT( pItem );
00106             return *pItem;
00107         }
00108 
00110         bool operator ==( const Iterator& in_rOp ) const
00111         {
00112             return ( pItem == in_rOp.pItem );
00113         }
00114 
00116         bool operator !=( const Iterator& in_rOp ) const
00117         {
00118             return ( pItem != in_rOp.pItem );
00119         }
00120     };
00121 #endif // #ifndef SWIG
00122 
00124     Iterator Begin() const
00125     {
00126         Iterator returnedIt;
00127         returnedIt.pItem = m_pItems;
00128         return returnedIt;
00129     }
00130 
00132     Iterator End() const
00133     {
00134         Iterator returnedIt;
00135         returnedIt.pItem = m_pItems + m_uLength;
00136         return returnedIt;
00137     }
00138 
00140     Iterator FindEx( ARG_T in_Item ) const
00141     {
00142         Iterator it = Begin();
00143 
00144         for ( Iterator itEnd = End(); it != itEnd; ++it )
00145         {
00146             if ( *it == in_Item )
00147                 break;
00148         }
00149 
00150         return it;
00151     }
00152 
00155     Iterator BinarySearch( ARG_T in_Item ) const
00156     {
00157         Iterator itResult = End();
00158         if (m_pItems)
00159         {
00160             T * pTop = m_pItems, * pBottom = m_pItems + m_uLength;
00161 
00162             while ( pTop <= pBottom )
00163             {
00164                 T* pThis = ( pBottom - pTop ) / 2 + pTop; 
00165                 if( in_Item < *pThis )
00166                     pBottom = pThis - 1;
00167                 else if ( in_Item > *pThis ) 
00168                     pTop = pThis + 1;
00169                 else
00170                 {
00171                     itResult.pItem = pThis;
00172                     break;
00173                 }
00174             }
00175         }
00176 
00177         return itResult;
00178     }
00179 
00181     Iterator Erase( Iterator& in_rIter )
00182     {
00183         AKASSERT( m_pItems != 0 );
00184 
00185         // Move items by 1
00186 
00187         T * pItemLast = m_pItems + m_uLength - 1;
00188 
00189         for ( T * pItem = in_rIter.pItem; pItem < pItemLast; pItem++ )
00190             pItem[ 0 ] = pItem[ 1 ];
00191 
00192         // Destroy the last item
00193 
00194         pItemLast->~T();
00195 
00196         m_uLength--;
00197 
00198         return in_rIter;
00199     }
00200 
00202     void Erase( unsigned int in_uIndex )
00203     {
00204         AKASSERT( m_pItems != 0 );
00205 
00206         // Move items by 1
00207 
00208         T * pItemLast = m_pItems + m_uLength - 1;
00209 
00210         for ( T * pItem = m_pItems+in_uIndex; pItem < pItemLast; pItem++ )
00211             pItem[ 0 ] = pItem[ 1 ];
00212 
00213         // Destroy the last item
00214 
00215         pItemLast->~T();
00216 
00217         m_uLength--;
00218     }
00219 
00222     Iterator EraseSwap( Iterator& in_rIter )
00223     {
00224         AKASSERT( m_pItems != 0 );
00225 
00226         if ( Length( ) > 1 )
00227         {
00228             // Swap last item with this one.
00229             *in_rIter.pItem = Last( );
00230         }
00231 
00232         // Destroy.
00233         AKASSERT( Length( ) > 0 );
00234         Last( ).~T();
00235 
00236         m_uLength--;
00237 
00238         return in_rIter;
00239     }
00240 
00242     AKRESULT Reserve( AkUInt32 in_ulReserve )
00243     {
00244         AKASSERT( m_pItems == 0 && m_uLength == 0 );
00245         AKASSERT( in_ulReserve || TGrowBy );
00246 
00247         if ( in_ulReserve )
00248         {
00249             m_pItems = (T *) TAlloc::Alloc( sizeof( T ) * in_ulReserve );
00250             if ( m_pItems == 0 )
00251                 return AK_InsufficientMemory;
00252 
00253             m_ulReserved = in_ulReserve;
00254         }
00255 
00256         return AK_Success;
00257     }
00258 
00259     AkUInt32 Reserved() const { return m_ulReserved; }
00260 
00262     void Term()
00263     {
00264         if ( m_pItems )
00265         {
00266             RemoveAll();
00267             TAlloc::Free( m_pItems );
00268             m_pItems = 0;
00269             m_ulReserved = 0;
00270         }
00271     }
00272 
00274     AkUInt32 Length() const
00275     {
00276         return m_uLength;
00277     }
00278 
00280     bool IsEmpty() const
00281     {
00282         return m_uLength == 0;
00283     }
00284     
00286     T* Exists(ARG_T in_Item) const
00287     {
00288         Iterator it = FindEx( in_Item );
00289         return ( it != End() ) ? it.pItem : 0;
00290     }
00291 
00294     T * AddLast()
00295     {
00296         size_t cItems = Length();
00297 
00298 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00299 #pragma warning( push )
00300 #pragma warning( disable : 4127 )
00301 #endif
00302         if ( ( cItems >= m_ulReserved ) && TGrowBy > 0 )
00303         {
00304             if ( !GrowArray() ) 
00305                 return 0;
00306         }
00307 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00308 #pragma warning( pop )
00309 #endif
00310 
00311         // have we got space for a new one ?
00312         if(  cItems < m_ulReserved )
00313         {
00314             T * pEnd = m_pItems + m_uLength++;
00315             AkPlacementNew( pEnd ) T; 
00316             return pEnd;
00317         }
00318 
00319         return 0;
00320     }
00321 
00323     T * AddLast(ARG_T in_rItem)
00324     {
00325         T * pItem = AddLast();
00326         if ( pItem )
00327             *pItem = in_rItem;
00328         return pItem;
00329     }
00330 
00332     T& Last()
00333     {
00334         AKASSERT( m_uLength );
00335 
00336         return *( m_pItems + m_uLength - 1 );
00337     }
00338 
00340     void RemoveLast()
00341     {
00342         AKASSERT( m_uLength );
00343         ( m_pItems + m_uLength - 1 )->~T();
00344         m_uLength--;
00345     }
00346 
00348     AKRESULT Remove(ARG_T in_rItem)
00349     {
00350         Iterator it = FindEx( in_rItem );
00351         if ( it != End() )
00352         {
00353             Erase( it );
00354             return AK_Success;
00355         }
00356 
00357         return AK_Fail;
00358     }
00359 
00362     AKRESULT RemoveSwap(ARG_T in_rItem)
00363     {
00364         Iterator it = FindEx( in_rItem );
00365         if ( it != End() )
00366         {
00367             EraseSwap( it );
00368             return AK_Success;
00369         }
00370 
00371         return AK_Fail;
00372     }
00373 
00375     void RemoveAll()
00376     {
00377         for ( Iterator it = Begin(), itEnd = End(); it != itEnd; ++it )
00378             (*it).~T();
00379         m_uLength = 0;
00380     }
00381 
00383     T& operator[](unsigned int uiIndex) const
00384     {
00385         AKASSERT( m_pItems );
00386         AKASSERT( uiIndex < Length() );
00387         return m_pItems[uiIndex];
00388     }
00389 
00392     T * Insert(unsigned int in_uIndex)
00393     {
00394         AKASSERT( in_uIndex <= Length() );
00395 
00396         size_t cItems = Length();
00397 
00398 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00399 #pragma warning( push )
00400 #pragma warning( disable : 4127 )
00401 #endif
00402         if ( ( cItems >= m_ulReserved ) && TGrowBy > 0 )
00403         {
00404             if ( !GrowArray() ) 
00405                 return 0;
00406         }
00407 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00408 #pragma warning( pop )
00409 #endif
00410 
00411         // have we got space for a new one ?
00412         if(  cItems < m_ulReserved )
00413         {
00414             T * pItemLast = m_pItems + m_uLength++;
00415             AkPlacementNew( pItemLast ) T; 
00416 
00417             // Move items by 1
00418 
00419             for ( T * pItem = pItemLast; pItem > ( m_pItems + in_uIndex ); --pItem )
00420                 pItem[ 0 ] = pItem[ -1 ];
00421 
00422             // Reinitialize item at index
00423 
00424             ( m_pItems + in_uIndex )->~T();
00425             AkPlacementNew( m_pItems + in_uIndex ) T; 
00426 
00427             return m_pItems + in_uIndex;
00428         }
00429 
00430         return 0;
00431     }
00432 
00434     bool GrowArray( AkUInt32 in_uGrowBy = TGrowBy )
00435     {
00436         AKASSERT( in_uGrowBy );
00437         
00438         AkUInt32 ulNewReserve = m_ulReserved + in_uGrowBy;
00439         T * pNewItems = (T *) TAlloc::Alloc( sizeof( T ) * ulNewReserve );
00440         if ( !pNewItems ) 
00441             return false;
00442 
00443         // Copy all elements in new array, destroy old ones
00444 
00445         size_t cItems = Length();
00446 
00447         if ( m_pItems ) 
00448         {
00449             for ( size_t i = 0; i < cItems; ++i )
00450             {
00451                 AkPlacementNew( pNewItems + i ) T; 
00452 
00453                 pNewItems[ i ] = m_pItems[ i ];
00454                 
00455                 m_pItems[ i ].~T();
00456             }
00457 
00458             TAlloc::Free( m_pItems );
00459         }
00460 
00461         m_pItems = pNewItems;
00462         m_ulReserved = ulNewReserve;
00463 
00464         return true;
00465     }
00466 
00468     bool Resize(AkUInt32 in_uiSize)
00469     {
00470         AkUInt32 cItems = Length();
00471         if (in_uiSize < cItems)
00472         {
00473             //Destroy superfluous elements
00474             for(AkUInt32 i = in_uiSize - 1 ; i < cItems; i++)
00475             {
00476                 m_pItems[ i ].~T();
00477             }
00478             m_uLength = in_uiSize;
00479             return true;
00480         }
00481 
00482         if ( in_uiSize > m_ulReserved )
00483         {
00484             if ( !GrowArray(in_uiSize - cItems) ) 
00485                 return false;
00486         }
00487 
00488         //Create the missing items.
00489         for(size_t i = cItems; i < in_uiSize; i++)
00490         {
00491             AkPlacementNew( m_pItems + i ) T; 
00492         }
00493 
00494         m_uLength = in_uiSize;
00495         return true;
00496     }
00497 
00498     void Transfer(AkArray<T,ARG_T,TAlloc,TGrowBy>& in_rSource)
00499     {
00500         if (m_pItems)
00501             Term();
00502 
00503         m_pItems = in_rSource.m_pItems;
00504         m_uLength = in_rSource.m_uLength;
00505         m_ulReserved = in_rSource.m_ulReserved;
00506 
00507         in_rSource.m_pItems = NULL;
00508         in_rSource.m_uLength = 0;
00509         in_rSource.m_ulReserved = 0;
00510     }
00511 
00512 protected:
00513 
00514     T *         m_pItems;       
00515     AkUInt32    m_uLength;      
00516     AkUInt32    m_ulReserved;   
00517 };
